articles.author: Aria Bendix
articles.title: A new milestone in the cancer fight: 7 in 10 patients now survive five-plus years - NBC News
articles.description: After a cancer diagnosis, 7 in 10 people now survive five years or more, according to a report from the American Cancer Society.
articles.content: The U.S. has reached a watershed moment in the fight against cancer: Seven in 10 people now survive five years or more after diagnosis, according to the latest annual report from the American Cancer … [+4207 chars]
